website_summaries.verdict: Hot or iced, this flavorful light brew can be enjoyed any time of day.
pros: A light, refreshing roast that's not weak or watered down
The coffee has no acidic taste and we found it to be easy on the stomach, even after multiple cups
This breakfast blend, while wonderful in the mornings, is mild enough to be enjoyed throughout the day
cons: Cups tend to clog the Keurig needle, so be sure to clean it regularly

customer_reviews.title: I have been a real fan of green mountain decaf ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been a real fan of green mountain decaf coffee pods for a long time, but I am having a ongoing problem with pods that don't work properly. I was constantly cleaning the machine. I finally gave up and bought a new Keurig machine and now I realize the problem is your Green Mountain decaf pods not my coffee machine! Every pod I try creates a real mess and is unfit to drink. Can I return what I have left? I have been a good customer the past year, but this last case has been a nightmare.
customer_reviews.author: BJB

customer_reviews.title: CAUTION: “This pod wasn’t designed for this brewer”
customer_reviews.text: Beware! I purchased these for my elderly mother on 7/6/18 and she finally got around to opening the package to use a k-cup. She informed me today (8/15/18) that she tried two k-cups but they didn’t work. I checked the pods and a message appears on the Keurig stating “This pod wasn’t designed for your brewer”! I’ve ordered these same pods twice previously and didn’t have any issues. I compared these pods to one from her previous order and the foil is ever so slightly off color but otherwise appear fine. Unfortunately I am past the return window from amazon so I guess I need to eat this purchase. See the attached photos.
customer_reviews.author: Paul C

customer_reviews.title: Good cup of decaf
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time finding decaf K-cups at any local grocery store so I often have to order them on amazon. Not a great deal per say, but an easy way to get my preferred coffee. I do not tolerate caffeine well, but I enjoy the taste of coffee (my coworkers think I’m crazy). I prefer light roast coffee, and this is a great light roast decaf coffee that is hard to find elsewhere. The green mountain brand doesn’t disappoint. I am not a coffee snob, and am not loyal to any particular brand, but I do find myself getting this brand/type more often than not.
customer_reviews.author: kstew

customer_reviews.title: Faulty pods
customer_reviews.text: Last 3 shipments had many faulty pods spilling grounds into my machine and cup. First 2 orders had around 6 faulty pods. Last shipment wasted about 1/3 of supply. Its very very frustrating having to clean Kuerig each time. Been a long-time buyer of this brand and enjoy the flavor and value, but their recent quality issues have lost them a regular buyer. Just purchased a new brand to try out. May try again in the future if they fix their pods.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly good basic decaf coffee
customer_reviews.text: I am not a coffee connoisseur, but also I don't want horrible coffee. This seems to fit the bill for reasonably priced coffee that tastes just fine. One hesitancy I have about it is that it is chemically decaffeinated and not decaffeinated through the swiss water method. I started drinking decaf to be more healthy, but then it turns out that I've been getting more chemicals via the decaffeination method. Sometimes it feels very frustrating to never be able to get that right. None the less, unless you are willing to pay a lot more for coffee that is more healthily decaffeinated, this is a very good reasonably priced and reasonably good tasting option.
customer_reviews.author: ElizabethTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Defective K-cups
customer_reviews.text: We have ordered Green Mountain Breakfast Blend many times. The last order has been a disaster. All but 3 k-cups in a box of 24 were defective. They bubbled up, over flowed and left what little coffee was in the cup full of grounds. This is very frustrating. So much so, we bought a new Keurig and new k-cups (Green Mountain). The new k-cups worked in the Keurig we were going to throw out. Now we will return the new Keuig and return the defective Green Mountain to Amazon. Is anyone at Amazon listening to these reports. We're not the first.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Tex

customer_reviews.title: Blowouts! What a mess!
customer_reviews.text: I've had multiple blowouts with this product. If you don't know what blowout is, it is when the seal at the top of the kcup breaks during operation. This causes coffee grinds to get all over the place and is a pain to clean. It takes about 10-15 minutes to clean the machine to ensuring the thousands of grinds are cleared. I'm not sure how to fix this. I looked at the boxes and they all have the same code so I'm assuming they were made at the same time. I opened a new box that wasn't near the problem box and it worked fine. Cleaning the machine just to have another one blowup is very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Involved

customer_reviews.title: Wish I NEVER bought a Keirug Coffeemaker
customer_reviews.text: I am sorry that I am forced to give it one star. The coffee cups that I received were defective. During the brew cycle, something internal in the cup broke and dumped the grounds into my coffee cup. After four more tries with the exact same results I tried another variety of Green Mountain coffee K cup that we use and it brewed successfully. I spent an hour on the phone with Keirug customer service trying to resolve issue. Now it will take 7 to 10 business days to get a new box of K cups. Keirug tells me they are not aware of the issue but I googled it and there are plenty of people having the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: gore

customer_reviews.title: This coffee has no flavor
customer_reviews.text: I like light roast coffee, but I also like coffee flavor, and unfortunately this coffee has no flavor at all. The only flavor comes from the creamer I use. I typically purchase Donut House light roast, which I love, but when the price on Prime went up significantly, I decided to try something else. I start looking forward to my morning cup of coffee the night before, so I was sadly disappointed the first morning I woke up to this cup of coffee. I now have 71 pods of coffee that I don't like. I am hoping that with the advent of pumpkin spice creamer this Fall, at least this coffee will taste like...well...pumpkin spice creamer.
customer_reviews.author: A. Bible

customer_reviews.title: Grounds in my decaf!
customer_reviews.text: I have brewed about 5 cups of the decaf and every time the grounds have come through with the coffee. It doesn’t happen with the regular and has never happened with previous orders of decaf. I have resorted to straining the decaf through coffee filters to catch the grounds.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it !
customer_reviews.text: I just got done cleaning up my Keurig. It took me over 30 minutes to clean it up. Amazon issued me a refund and I disposed of them. Just remember if you do purchase, and you have this issue run a few cycles of just water afterwards. Remember you were warned ! I will Never buy these Kcups again !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Customer

customer_reviews.title: not a full cup
customer_reviews.text: Something is definitely wrong with Green Mountain pods now. They fail to brew anywhere near a full cup. There are also coffee grounds everywhere. It seems the coffee is too dense or packed too tightly or something. This does not happen with any other brand so I know it is something wrong with these pods. I am very disappointed because I have been a huge fan of Green Mountain coffee up to now.
customer_reviews.author: kazie

customer_reviews.title: An excellent light roast decaf coffee
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I enjoy lightly roasted coffee. When have had our quota of caffeine, but want more coffee, Green Mountain Breakfast Blend Decaf is one we brew. It has excellent flavor without bitterness, and no caffeine aftereffect.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Howard B. Bandy

customer_reviews.title: Many pods fail during brewing, coffee undrinkable, big mess to clean up!
customer_reviews.text: We have been very satisfied with the flavor and performance of this product for four years. BUT, in our most recent order (Sept 2018) far too many of the pods have been failing! A bit of the top seal lifts during brewing causing hot water and coffee grounds to overflow inside the machine and all over the coffee cup. IT IS A BIG MESS! and a bad way to start the day! I’m no longer willing to play k cup roulette every morning. I would appreciate hearing from the vendor about how to return the unopened boxes and get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: K Berg

customer_reviews.title: I suspect that this is how the company rids itself of seconds.
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is good, but the K-cup quality is horrible. EVERY cup is built such that the hot water barely trickles through. It takes MUCH longer to make a cup of coffee then when I use this companies cups sold in the grocery store. It's soooo slow, that the coffee is almost cold when done dripping. I suspect that this is how the company rids itself of seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W.

customer_reviews.title: The pods break apart in the Keurig spilling grounds all over
customer_reviews.text: The pods are defective and break apart while brewing spilling coffee grounds inside the machine causing it to clog and need cleaning. Until they improve the pods, I wouldn't order this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: gcutch7

customer_reviews.title: Best Keurig pods out there
customer_reviews.text: Best Keurig pods out there, you can buy lots that are cheaper but none that will be near as smooth and tasty as Green Mountain. You can't really even tell the difference between the decaf and the regular and I drink both. Start out the day with a cup of two of good old coffee and finish the day with the decaf. For anyone who hasn't tried the Green Mountain brand I strongly suggest you do, you will not be disappointed. And if you like a bit more strength to your coffee then I would suggest there Dark Magic style.
customer_reviews.author: patricia

customer_reviews.title: Will NOT work in my Keurig machine
customer_reviews.text: I love Green Mountain (GM) coffee. I ordinarily purchase my kcups at a big box store. This light roast breakfast blend is different than the “normal” GM breakfast blend, not only in the roast, but in the grind. It will NOT brew in my Keurig machine without clogging the brew head assembly, requiring a paper clip clean out of the upper pin. I’m not talking “occasionally”... this has happened with every single kcup I’ve tried from this shipment! 100%. No exaggeration. We have tried other GM flavors and (including the GM regular Breakfast Blend) roasts and have had 0 problems, so it’s not GM, it’s just this Light Roast Breakfast Blend. Very frustrating. Save your hard-earned money.
customer_reviews.author: Westie Mom

customer_reviews.title: Its decaf but its real coffee
customer_reviews.text: When I started using a single cup brewing operation, I started looking for a decaf coffee that had good, rich flavor. Tried several and found them flat and ordinary. I then decided to try Green Mountain and found it fit all the requirements I had for a decaf. The most important of these was it tasted like real coffee. I now buy anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Lambert

customer_reviews.title: coffee leaks out of pod, grounds all over
customer_reviews.text: This last box of green mountain pods k-cup I bought has quit a few bad pods. The grounds come out the hole in the top of the k-cup and I have to throw my cup of coffee away as the cup is full of grounds. For the expense of this coffee they shouldn't do that, It's KA. 20:47, PL135 9020. The coffee is great but the leaking problem is not!
customer_reviews.author: Mili Carlson

customer_reviews.title: My Keurig screen display says: this is Not Keurig Compatible!  Only 1 in 5 work!
customer_reviews.text: There is something WRONG with the Keurig digital code on this product! We have to throw away 4 bad - that won't read - and then 1 will read and work. So this was a HUGE rip off. Very unhappy, but I did not return because the very first pod worked - and then we kept trying to see if we could find another that worked - it took until the 5th pod for it to work. You can slightly see a pattern irregularity on the code that the machine reads. Very frustrating since I bought these because my husband and I had back to back surgeries and we were not allowed to drink beverage with caffeine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Some of the coffee pods are defective.
customer_reviews.text: I recently ordered the Green Mountain Keurig K-Cups , 96 count. I usually order the Keurig K-Cups, 72, count. I was having trouble with my old Keurig when I received this new order. Frequently, the pods left significant amounts of coffee grounds in the cup. Thinking my machine was old, I ordered a new one. I have had the new machine for only a week and the pods are also leaving coffee grounds in the cup. The only constant in this problem are the new pods. I hate to think I just paid over $145.00 for a new Keurig when only the pods are defective!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara L.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: Whenever I use these pods, I get coffee grounds in my cup and have to clean my machine and throw out the coffee. I have returned coffee makers because I was blaming the machine. It is the pods. I am afraid to buy any Breakfast Blend k cups again. I use other flavor cups and have no problem. I use the half kaff green mountain cups and have no problem. It was a big waste of money buying 6 boxes.
customer_reviews.author: bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Pods not recgonized by my Keurig machine
customer_reviews.text: I order the Green Mountain Breakfast Blend Single-Serve Keurig K-Cup Pods, regularly. We like the coffee. Once, in the past, and now again with this order, the Keurig machine does not recognize these as k-pods. If I lift the handle and bring it down again, sometimes, 2 or 3 times, the pod is recognized and I can brew my coffee. I ordered the Vanilla Caramel pods at the same time as we switch off, and have no problem with those. I suspect something in the batch is printed off. I've had to discard 3 pods so far because nothing I do gets them recognized as belonging with my Keurig machine. Ugh!
customer_reviews.author: Carol&Jackie Winicur

customer_reviews.title: We’ve been drinking it for years!
customer_reviews.text: We love this coffee!!! It isn’t real strong, which is important to us and we can get 2 cups from each K-cup. The flavor is refreshing and even though it’s not “full bodied “ (which we can’t handle) it still retains great aroma and taste. We’ve been using it for years and have tried others, but we’re sticking with this one as long as it’s available!
customer_reviews.author: shotgun20

customer_reviews.title: Defective K-Cups????????
customer_reviews.text: I suspect the last two shipments of this product to have been defective, resulting in 1/4 cup to 1/2 cup of coffee.Grounds in the cup holder area. We cleaned and cleaned and occasionally we'd get a cup of coffee per K-cup. Could not find an expiration date on the previous packaging. As a last resort we ordered and received a new shipment that had immediate results, in getting Full Cups of Coffee! Once again, looking for clues as to dates or expiration and can not find any. Anyone else run across a similar problem?
customer_reviews.author: ctw

customer_reviews.title: Will not buy again because thy are not sealed rght
customer_reviews.text: Will not buy this again, purchased the 72 count for the 2nd time . Thought I would give thm another chance the first box I open once again they are not vacumm sealed there is air in the k cup so I have to take a saftey pin and poke a vert small hole in it or when the lid is closed the top will pop and coffee will go all over in the pot
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: We tried this coffee at a convenience store in 2006. It is delicious. Not too strong--not too weak and with no bitterness. The K Cups are as good as the drip version.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Green Mountain Coffee Review
customer_reviews.text: I gave this product only two stars. The coffee tastes great but when used in my pod coffee maker, it leaves grounds in the pod area and in my coffee cup. The grounds left are so heavy it will ruin my Keurig and I can't drink the coffee there are so many grounds in cup. Evidently this is NOT to be used in my Keurig. I have opened the pods and used it in a regular coffee maker so as not to waste my money. My neighbor also has a pod coffee maker and we tried it in her's - same problem. Hoping they fix this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Milne

customer_reviews.title: Meh, nothing there.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it's the roast. But this coffee doesn't have the 'bite' I need in the morning. I remember a few years ago Green Mountain was excellent. Then a friend mentioned how Green Mountain 'used to' have it and seems more blah now. I had been thinking the same thing since I purchased a large box of these. It's now my 'backup' coffee and I'm using a cheaper - yet better tasking and more bold, coffee. Idk what's happened to green mountain but I never expected to find their coffee to be so blah.
customer_reviews.author: Shaunagain

customer_reviews.title: Terrible batch
customer_reviews.text: We have these shipped to us on a regular basis however this particular shipment was terrible. We cleaned the Keurig, etc. to see what the problem was but they still tasted bad. The individual boxes say that they should be good until July 2019. I'm not sure if this was just a bad batch but when we brought in another box from a different shipment, they tasted fine. I went on the amazon website to return this batch but it was past the time frame.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa J. Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Very good decaf
customer_reviews.text: This is the best decaf I've had. I've been drinking another brand and it was awful and left a weird after-taste. The Green Mountain decaf taste much better, with no after-taste. I don't suppose any decaf will ever taste as good as "real" coffee, but for decaf this is really very good.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Check the expiration dates!
customer_reviews.text: Just just received my order of Green Mointain breakfast blend coffee and notch the expiration date of 13 MAR 2010. Yes, it was "BEST BY" 6 years ago. Lesson learned: don't purchase food items from Amazon. You never know what your getting
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Some Pods break open
customer_reviews.text: I love my Keurig pods and the Green Mountain Breakfast blend is a great coffee, but the last batch I received must have had some manufacturing flaw. Several of the pods burst when the water was coming through and ground were all over the place. We use other pod types, and this didn't happen to them, so I know it wasn't the Keurig. Since you can't return the coffee, I will be more particular about the pods I get. These had a different, darker color on the top, rather than the usual green top. I plan to contact the supplier also.
customer_reviews.author: BatterZup

customer_reviews.title: Absolute favorite coffee, very light and smooth
customer_reviews.text: Not a big fan of really strong coffee, do not like the taste of turpentine. I drink 2 cups of coffee a day and I am very picky. I've tried several other coffees and this is the one I always come back to. Love it. Light roast, smooth, no upset tummy and no crazy jitters although just the right amount of caffeine to get me going in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: MoMo

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: 07/Nov/19 PROS + Delicious balanced flavor (Not too light no too strong). We have been drinking this for months! Our favourite! + DECAF! And it does not lose any boldness! CONS - None... * I will update this review if something changes as I keep using the product. * If you found this review helpful, please click below! This will help other users like you to make informed decisions before spending their money!
customer_reviews.author: David Palomino

customer_reviews.title: Pod after pod fails, with grinds in coffee
customer_reviews.text: Like so many others who have received this product recently from Keurig Direct, nearly 100% of the pods fail in the Keurig, causing every cup to fill with coffee grinds. Like the other users, we have cleaned the needles and followed other basic steps. Of note, we have several other brands of pods that work perfectly fine. The only question is whether this is quality control issue with Green Mountain or Amazon. Although the seller is "Keurig Direct", I would not be surprised to learn that Amazon's supply chain flows through China, where an inferior product could be substituted without Keurig's knowledge.
customer_reviews.author: JO

customer_reviews.title: Get rid of this product!
customer_reviews.text: Like many other reviews, when I make a cup of coffee the pod fail and coffee grounds go into the coffee so I have to pour it into another cup to get rid of most of the grounds. No other pods that I use do this. Amazon needs to remove this product.
customer_reviews.author: MK Sadler

customer_reviews.title: Really like this Brand
customer_reviews.text: I used to drink med roast coffee but with stomach issues found out no more problems when I switched to a lighter breakfast blend in the morning. I will continue to use this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ezekiel

customer_reviews.title: Flavor was fine, but these were the first time I had ...
customer_reviews.text: Flavor was fine, but these were the first time I had issues with brewing. Only these, made to be used in Keurig k-pods would make brewing "freeze up" during brewing. Left lots of grounds.....thought it was a fluke with first box of 4, but all 4 boxes were a problem. I could immediately brew a different pod with no problems, but the minute I used one of these it would have same problem every time. Weird. Never happened before, and hope not again, but this time the purchase did not meet my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Monique Watkins

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CUP OF JOE!
customer_reviews.text: Well we have been drinking Green Mountain Breakfast Blend for several years, We have tried other blends, but we always come back to GM Breakfast blend, it has a fresh, mild flavor, so if you like mud coffee you won't like this, but if you like a great cup of full flavored coffee this is it. We always come back to Green Mountain Breakfast Blend it is delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Moen

customer_reviews.title: Faulty k-cups. Grounds EVERYWHERE
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought my Green Mountain Breakfast Blend from Amazon with no problems for over the past 4 years. This case has been the worst. LITERALLY every other k-cup explodes in my Keurig & cup of ‘coffee’. I’ve deep cleaned my Keurig as guided through multiple websites to no avail. Broke down and bought a new Keurig. I must’ve have just gotten lucky for the past week because here we ago again with the coffee grounds! :( Will not purchase k-cups from Amazon again because the risk is NOT worth the reward
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I drink 3-4 cups of coffee a day and have tried almost every decaf k-cup on Amazon. After years of buying variety packs this is one of the brands we settled on. If you are looking for something with a light taste - we both take it with milk or cream - then you may like this one. We buy it in bulk on subscription for added savings.
customer_reviews.author: Woody

customer_reviews.title: GREEN MOUTAIN BAD BOX OF COFFEE.... 32 PODS
customer_reviews.text: PURCHASE THIS COFFEE DUE TO IT WAS A GREAT BUY AND I DRINK THIS BRAND OF COFFEE. BUT WHEN I WENT TO MAKEA CUT OF IT, IT SMELLED BAD WHEN I WAS BREWING, IT SMELLED LIKE IT WAS BURNING. WELL I WENT AHEAD AND HAD MY CUP AND IT WAS LIKE DRINKING A CUP OF COFFEE. WITH CHEMICAL'S POURED IN IT THE TASTE WAS SO BAD. WELL OK POURED IT OUT AND TOOK ANOTHER ONE FROM THE CENTER SAME-THING THEN LAST TRY ONE OFF THE BOTTOM OK SAME TASTE. NOW I GAVE UP, IT IS JUST A BAD BOX OF COFFEE, SENDING IT BACK TO AMAZON......
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my first Keurig several months ago. I started with the Starbucks as I was familiar with that brand. However Keurig had included a coupon for $3.00 off for the Green Mountain pods -so I bought a box. I liked the Green Mountain much better than Starbucks and have been using them ever since. I bragged about them so much to my son and daughter-in-law (who were hard and fast Starbucks fans ) they tried Green Mountain and were sold. They haven’t gone back to Starbucks.
customer_reviews.author: Coastal consumer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the morning!
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy coffee, but I am not a fan of dark roast. I had had Green Mountain in the past, so I wanted to give this light one a try. I am very pleased with this coffee and will likely be purchasing it as my go-to light roast coffee now! It is not too strong for me, and it tastes great with a little half and half or creamer.
customer_reviews.author: Rach

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for exploding cups
customer_reviews.text: Of the pack of 72 k-cups, 23 of them were not sealed properly so they would explode. I eventually sorted them all out and had to purchase a mesh k-cup to use the remaining pods. S idn’t seem like a value and will not be purchasing them again.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Not happy at all
customer_reviews.text: Item came in as normal i have ordered many of these. First cup i put into machine i ended up with a cup of coffee and grounds. It has been the same way with everyone i used. Any other kcup no problem. It appears these were made wrong or something the bottom is too low and when the needle in the machine punctures i pours grounds into cup. Not happy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This makes a very tasty cup of coffee.
customer_reviews.text: I tried several different brands of K Cup coffee before deciding that I prefer this one above others. On the package the label says "light roast". However, I would consider it to be between light and medium. It has a very smooth taste. some coffees require me to add a tiny bit of cream to make the coffee smooth. Not this one. It's great just as when poured straight into the cup
customer_reviews.author: kenneth W. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: It makes good coffee
customer_reviews.text: I previously made a negative review - I am sorry for that. I just realized that my previous box contained 4 packs of 12 k-cups each for a total of 72. This last box came with only three packs, but they had 24 k-cups each with equals 72 k-cups. So, I am very happy with my order and with the product. Donald Bundy
customer_reviews.author: Donald E. Bundy

customer_reviews.title: Pod blowout
customer_reviews.text: Hi Seller, Good product but we have had several of the pods blowout and spew coffee ground outward onto our machine. Could you please provide 4 replacement pods, Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: P-man

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as caffeinated
customer_reviews.text: I generally like Green Mountain but this Decaf version is hard to drink. I feel more of the decaf aftertaste rather than the caffeine. A little disappointing
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: The Decaf Light Roasted version DOES NOT WORK ON THE KEURIG
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed. I got the decaf version and it was a total waste of money. 1. Several cups came open and damaged 2. The worst part is that this cups do not work in the coffee maker, to make 1 coffee a have to go for at least 5 cups and put them in a certain way to get my coffee maker going. (It give me a message that say this cups are not made for the Keurig coffee maker) 3. After I started to put this cups in the coffee make, the machine started to get clog almost daily. DO NOT BUY THIS VERSION OF THE PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: YVB

customer_reviews.title: Defective KCups blow out grounds into your cup
customer_reviews.text: We ordered 72 count and of the 6 pods we used so far, every one has spewed the grounds out. We're using a screen now to catch the grounds as much as we can. Pulled up order to return, and it indicates "not returnable.". Extremely, extremely dissatisfied with this product. Already tired of cleaning the coffeemaker. And we've got 66 pods to go! BTW, we've had no issues with other brands of kcups recently purchased, so it's not the coffeemaker.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Mystery Pods
customer_reviews.text: While we have bought these coffee pods in stores, this box of 32 pods purchased online has been a disappointment. My husband has used 9 pods so far, and each one ended up leaving coffee grounds in the cup with the coffee— undrinkable. We also bought Green Mountain decaf Vanilla and that purchase has proven a great choice. It’s a mystery.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Zahller

customer_reviews.title: Exploding Pod from Hell
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time that I ever had a problem with pods exploding. After five in a row, I just gave up. Now I just open the pod and pour the coffee into a brew basket I bought to make my own. The coffee does taste good and maybe you won't have the same problems I did.
customer_reviews.author: Monty

customer_reviews.title: Not so good this time
customer_reviews.text: Have ordered this previously and it was great. This time the coffee tasted good but somehow the coffee grounds are getting into the coffee and kind of spoils it. Have experimented some and have found it id only and consistently this product. Starbucks and Kirkland work fine with no grounds. I'm thinking the pod built in filter may be defective but in any case I will not be reforming this coffee item. Paul
customer_reviews.author: Paul in Hercules

customer_reviews.title: TOO lite!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the speed with which it came as always however the taste was horrible. Light roast is not even close. It taste like a pod that has been used at least once before I could not even drink it using cream there's just no flavor to it. Perhaps it is a fluke batch but I'm not willing to keep trying to find one that has any flavor I'm going to donate it to the mission.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl J. Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Just what the doctor ordered!
customer_reviews.text: Green Mountain has a winner in these Light Roast Decaf coffee pods. Great smooth flavor (I am not one to enjoy the dark bold coffees...too strong.) Considering I have been placed on a non-caffeine diet, this is just what the doctor ordered! I am considering a subscription through Amazon! Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Charge too much
customer_reviews.text: I was charge too much, 08/30/2019 Hide additional information for activity type debit cards -120.10 Amazon Prime 08/29 PURCHASE Amzn.com/bill WA Edit Description activity type debit cards status type icon cleared Cleared. Select to mark activity type debit cards -120.10 Amazon Prime 08/29 PURCHASE Amzn.com/bill WA as Reconciled -120.10 23,694.33 Type:Debit cardPurchaser:RUSS F RING Description:Amazon Prime 08/29 PURCHASE Amzn.com/bill WA Merchant category:Direct Marketing - Continuity/Subscription Merchants Merchant category code:5968 Merchant name:get more information about merchant name changeAMAZON PRIMESelect to Edit the merchant name Transaction category:get more information about transaction categoryShopping & Entertainment: General MerchandiseSelect to Edit
customer_reviews.author: Russ Ring

customer_reviews.title: WRONG PRICE PER but LOVE this coffee
customer_reviews.text: This is not the correct price per cup. $49.89 divided by 72=$0.69. It states that it's $0.53. I took away one star hoping this was an oversight due to price changes or something of that nature. The coffee is fantastic though! We've tried many over the years but this one is a perfect blend for our whole family. Great flavor but not "overwhelmingly roasty."
customer_reviews.author: Linda Lasher

customer_reviews.title: Best coffee flavor!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tasting coffee by far! My husband and I love the flavor and has just the right richness for both of us. We always keep our house well stocked on the breakfast blend, light roast k cups! Such a great and easy way to make a fresh yummy cup of coffee in the mornings.
customer_reviews.author: Mike & Katie

customer_reviews.title: Only Coffee My Hubby Will Drink
customer_reviews.text: Have bought NUMEROUS boxes of these pods. Never disappointed. Never have had any issues with expiration dates being short (good for at least a year). Product is always fresh. Should just get on the subscribe & save program based on how many of these things I buy for him!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Breakfast Blend
customer_reviews.text: I can see why this morning. 3 in a row blew the grounds out into the cup and topped off with hot water. Not wasting my time with this brand any longer
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Riney

customer_reviews.title: K-cups top blow out.
customer_reviews.text: We simply cannot waste our money on these K-cups. They are a serious problem in the Keurig as the top pops out leaving a lot of grounds in the coffee cup as well as in the Keurig. It seems that these specific pods were not sealed properly as I don't have any problem with the Dark Magic decaf. We have had at least 20 of these blow out on us. Hoping you can fix this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Linda H.

customer_reviews.title: Decaf. Tastes Fine. Socially Responsible Coffee
customer_reviews.text: Meh! It tastes okay. I am not much of a coffee drinker. One of my main Kuerig drinkers goes DECAF on me every now-and-then. SO, since he loves all things socially responsible, I got this box and he read the marketing on it and now he loves it. It's a fine decaf. I got it for less than 50 cents a cup, so I am happy, too.
customer_reviews.author: Southwest Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Not so good.
customer_reviews.text: I have had my Keurig for two years. This is the first time I have ordered k cups from this company. Unfortunately, I have had several k cups explode while brewing. I end up with grounds in the coffee and at least once, coffee and grounds all over my counter. I'm very disappointed and will not be ordering from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best coffee ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Love this coffee it is so smooth and no after taste. our blend is just that the best green mountain coffee ever made.
customer_reviews.author: Kay M.

customer_reviews.title: SOOOO Good
customer_reviews.text: I've been drinking Green Mountain Breakfasty Bleand for at least 20 years. Smooth coffee that can be flavored with ANY creamer. I truly look foreword to my first cup everyday!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Brennon

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: These k-cups are terrible. I believe they are not actually Greenmountain brand and are a knock off. Every box has at least 8 to 10 cups that explode in the Keurig while it is trying to brew so every cup of coffee has coffee grounds in it. Is extremely frustrating when you’re trying to get out of the door in a hurry to get to work. Complete waste of money. Initially thought maybe I got one bad box, But so far every box in the pack has had cups that are defective.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good!
customer_reviews.text: There's really not much I can say about this - taste is good for a decaf coffee plus I add my flavored creamer, too. Since my doctor advised me to cut caffeine, I have been drinking herbal tea and decaf coffee (the coffee only about 1-2 times a week) I also cut off caffeinated sodas which I am not even missing anymore and I have done this for 3 years now. I think I'm healthier and also saves me money!
customer_reviews.author: MysticalRoseTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Breakfast blend decaf:  flat and ashy
customer_reviews.text: Having had and liked other Green Mountain coffees, I had high hopes for the breakfast blend decaf. I was disappointed to find it flat and almost ashy. It smells fine while brewing, but really doesn't taste much like coffee. I drink coffee iced, so perhaps this particular coffee is better when hot? I won't be buying this particular decaf again.
customer_reviews.author: Gothikim

customer_reviews.title: Best Tasting Decaf I Found
customer_reviews.text: Needed to reduce my caffeine intake but never could find a decaf that was even tolerable. This actually tastes pretty good and don't ask me why, it tastes better than the caffeinated version of the same coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Wanderer

customer_reviews.title: Exploding Breakfast Blend K-cups
customer_reviews.text: As noted in several other reviews, Keurig's quality control has fallen off a cliff with the breakfast blend k-cups. They keep exploding in the Keurig machine creating a mess. Out of the recent box of 12, so far 4 have ruptured in the machine. From the number of people with this same problem, it is very clear that Keurig no longer cares. I encourage Amazon to drop these K-cups as they are increasingly defective. I have enjoyed breakfast blend K-cups for years but now the mess they cause isn't worth the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Hecox

customer_reviews.title: Malfunctioning lot
customer_reviews.text: There was some sort of problem with this whole lot of decaf. Every time I tried to use it the machine malfunctioned, spewed grounds and had to be cleaned. I threw the whole pack away after about 6 tries Bought some of same thing at grocery today and they work fine. Weird.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Slay

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product
customer_reviews.text: I have been drinking this coffee every morning for about three years now. It is smooth and not over cooked like some other blends. The cost from Amazon is better than local grocery stores and it arrives the day after I order it. How could it be better than that?
customer_reviews.author: Mark Chester

customer_reviews.title: Problem with the Pods
customer_reviews.text: My problem was having the coffee grounds coming out in my cup of coffee. Not all the time, but much more than I liked.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Won’t dispense coffee
customer_reviews.text: Good flavor, but the pods won’t dispense coffee Thur, coffee backs up and makes a mess. I thought it was just one pod, but have tried 8 so far, what a waste. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Lori Brink

customer_reviews.title: Great taste! Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This coffee is great! Wonderful flavor. It wakes me up without making me jittery. The price is VERY reasonable. This will be a regular at my house.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Key

customer_reviews.title: This coffee is good, but like ALL k-cups
customer_reviews.text: This coffee is good, but like ALL k-cups, it's too expensive at about $0.50/ cup. I tried to re-order yesterday and the cheapest I could find it (incl shipping &tax) was $0.55 per K-cup, when ordered in bulk. The Keurig system is a better value the less coffee you drink, and the opposite is also true unfortunately. And we drink a lot of coffee. If I can't continue to find quality K-Cups at no more than ~ $0.50 each, it's time to go back to buying 10 oz bags of SBUX at the grocery store and brewing partial pots when I don't need a whole pot of coffee!
customer_reviews.author: Coffee4matt

customer_reviews.title: Bad purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bad purchase cup not doublwe walled hot on hands cover falls off
customer_reviews.author: DCORR

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because it was on sale, the price was too good to pass up. In the past, when I have purchased kpods on sale, I have been disappointed at the flavor. This coffee pod was excellent and I will continue to purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Rich taste without being bitter
customer_reviews.text: Miss the Golden French Toast! This; however, is an excellent alternative. I add liquid Italian creamer for sweetness. What can I say, if I was a purist this coffee would be one I could drink with no extras as it is light not bitter.
customer_reviews.author: S. H.

customer_reviews.title: Did not like the flavor
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the flavor of this coffee. I had Gevalia Signature k-pods for a long time. The price of Gevalia went up considerably and I decided to try Green Mountain because of the great reviews. I ended up donating all the six boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE OF FRESHNESS - Short Dated Product
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed when I was putting my coffee away to find out that the freshness date was SEPTEMBER 2020. I ordered it July 4, and received it July 14. I checked another box that I picked up at the store and the it’s freshness date was 2022. To me that meant the 6 boxes I just received could be at least 2 years old. I was even more disappointed to find out that they could not be returned. I will no longer order it online even though I liked buying in quantity. I never thought the date would be so short!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Something must be wrong with the box we received. My husband had to use 7 before he got one that didn’t let the coffee grinds come out with the coffee. We have a brand new coffee maker that has been working just fine so it’s not that. Maybe we got a defective box. As of now I am canceling my subscription.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy D

customer_reviews.title: Messy
customer_reviews.text: Good overall but we have about one in ten blow the seal on the top of the cup which creates a terrible mess. I visually inspect them before I put them into my Keurig maker but they all seem to have a good seal until they don't.
customer_reviews.author: MartinLogan

customer_reviews.title: Defective decaf Kcups
customer_reviews.text: The Kcups were defective.The cups would not allow the water to filter through the cups. They would only allow a half a cup. I tried other coffee K cups and they worked fine. The decaf cuts were defective.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Harvey

customer_reviews.title: The Breakfast Blend DECAF is a smooth light coffee that I find perfect for evenings before bedtime
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying the coffee immensely. I have purchased it several times and was thrilled to find this larger count box available at a more reasonable price. The Breakfast Blend DECAF is a smooth light coffee that I find perfect for evenings before bedtime. Since I do not care for the strong coffees, I also purchase the Breakfast Blend with caffeine for mornings. It was packaged appropriately and received in just a few days. I look forward to purchasing this about every other month.
customer_reviews.author: Blaze

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee at a competitive price
customer_reviews.text: This is great coffee and Amazon offers it at a competitive price and delivers it to your front door. Will definitely order again. If you are looking for a really good cup of coffee to start your day you have got to try this.
customer_reviews.author: sockettuem

customer_reviews.title: Buy if you want a clogged Keurig!
customer_reviews.text: The taste of this coffee is fine WHEN I can get it to actually dispense. Other cups work fine but as soon as I try to use one of these. Nadda. Use a different cup. Fine again. It’s something about these particular cups my Keurig just does not like them. I will not buy this Mountain kind again.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Not satified with product, doesn't deserve 1 star
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with the last order of green mountain breakfast blend coffee. The filter inside the cup does not drain well as if it is too thick. I loose a lot of flavour and it is still half full in the cup only filling my coffee cup less than halfway. I have no other choice but to not buy them anymore. Amazon should think twice before offering it in the present kcups.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grounds in every cup
customer_reviews.text: We usually like Green Mountain, however this was a bad batch. Nearly every cup had grounds in it. At one point my machine flashed up a message about blockage that we’ve never encountered before. Not sure why, but bad enough that we stop using & are just holding for backup if we’re desperate.
customer_reviews.author: KaJaRey

customer_reviews.title: Best Decaf
customer_reviews.text: This is the best decaf coffee for the Keurig because it is not too strong.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting coffee at a low cost!
customer_reviews.text: We love the flavor of these K-cups. Green Mountain light roast is actually not as light as you might think. It is very close to a medium roast but fits our taste perfectly. Buy in bulk to get the most for your dollars, this coffee will not disappoint you.
customer_reviews.author: Keith E. Schallon

customer_reviews.title: green mountain coffee
customer_reviews.text: I have always used this brand for several years but for some reason it does not taste the same anymore. I'm a big give me my coffee before you even try to have a conversation with me. ☺ I don't drink coffee anymore and that is something I enjoyed so much. Could there be a reason for this? Cannot drink regular that my husband enjoys. I even purchased a new Keurig coffee Kcup but the coffee still taste different. You can check my orders to see how often i have ordered and give me some answers.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Coffee
customer_reviews.text: Awesome coffee. Good taste. One of the better coffee brands out there. It's also hard for me to find decaf in the grocery store. There's not much available. I love shopping on Amazon for my coffee and a lot of other things. Amazon has better prices too! And with Prime I can't lose.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Good Cup of Coffee!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great morning blend style of coffee. Green Mountain coffee has been a household staple since I was a little kid. They've grown exponentially since then and with their Keurig brewing system, I've recently gotten back into drinking Green Mountain Breakfast Blend. It's a pretty good cup of coffee and it's something that most coffee drinkers (in the same family) can agree on! Give it a shot if you've never had it before!
customer_reviews.author: T. Lamonica

customer_reviews.title: Finding last order far too watery/bland
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps my taste buds are more medium blend now. But, finding the Breakfast blend far too weak now. It's like running a KCUP through a second time. Likely done with this flavor..
customer_reviews.author: gb_ott

customer_reviews.title: Unexpectedly Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Something has definitely charged in the strength and flavor of this coffee. Been drinking this coffee for years. Not getting the coffee flavor experience i’m used to with Green Mountain Breakfast blend!! Very bland, like drinking the k cup that has been brewed serval times. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Green Mountain Coffee Roasters Breakfast Blend, Single-Serve Keurig K-Cup Pods, Light Roast Coffee, 72 Count
product_meta.description: Flavor:Breakfast Blend| Size:12 Count (Pack of 6)The mountains are a special place. It's where Green Mountain Coffee Roasters was born. It's where we developed our adventurous spirit and commitment to improving the lands through sustainably sourced coffee. We're driven to bring the world a richer, better cup of coffee. Be bold. Be alive. Grab a cup and get out there. An eye-opener as delightful as the dawn itself. Clean and bright, with balanced sweetness, nutty flavor, and a silky mouthfeel. Made with 100% Arabica coffee. These single-serve K-Cup pods are compatible with all Keurig K-Cup Pod Single-Serve Coffee Makers. Each K-Cup pod is filled with the freshest ground coffee and brews a perfect, great tasting cup of coffee, every time. Certified Orthodox Union Kosher. What does being 100% responsibly sourced coffee mean? Responsibly Sourced means the coffee we purchase is grown and sold in adherence to a credible sourcing program that aligns with our company Responsible Sourcing Guidelines. Our coffee will be 100% responsibly sourced by the end of 2020.
feature_bullets: BRAND STORY: The mountains are a special place. It's where Green Mountain Coffee Roasters was born. It's where we developed our adventurous spirit and commitment to improving the lands through sustainably sourced coffee. We're driven to bring the world a richer, better cup of coffee. Be bold. Be alive. Grab a cup and get out there.
TASTE: An eye-opener as delightful as the dawn itself. Clean and bright, with balanced sweetness, nutty flavor, and a silky mouthfeel.
ROAST: Light roast caffeinated coffee made with 100% Arabica beans and is certified Orthodox Union Kosher (U)
SUSTAINABILITY: Committed to 100% responsibly sourced coffee by end of 2020
COMPATIBILITY: Contains genuine Keurig K-Cup pods, engineered for guaranteed quality and compatibility with all Keurig K-Cup coffee makers

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
